document_data.name: Galdrin Bressar
document_data.mainbody: '''Galdrin Bressar''' was a retired lumberjack who was the Axe-Mayor of [[Quaervarr]] in [[1484 DR]].
document_data.History: After [[Highharvestide]] of 1484 DR, a supposed [[phantom]] started to appear in the village. Galdrin did not believe in a supernatural apparition but admitted that his villagers were very scared.
